Off Balance is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Off Balance Information

The affected entity has Disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity Checks, and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage.

How to Acquire Off Balance

Gust of Wind Weapon Actions such as Flourish or Gargantuan Cleave.

How to Remove Off Balance

Removed by taking damage or when Helped.
